1: אַ֣לְלַי <sup>480 </sup> <n>Woe</n> לִ֗י כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> הָיִ֙יתִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>I am</n> כְּאָסְפֵּי־ <sup>625 </sup> <n>is me for I am as when they have gathered</n> קַ֔יִץ <sup>7019 </sup> <n>the summer fruits</n> כְּעֹלְלֹ֖ת <sup>5955 </sup> <n>as the grapegleanings</n> בָּצִ֑יר <sup>1210 </sup> <n>of the vintage</n> אֵין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>There</n> אֶשְׁכּ֣וֹל <sup>811 </sup> <n>[there is] no cluster</n> לֶאֱכ֔וֹל <sup>398 </sup> <n>to eat</n> בִּכּוּרָ֖ה <sup>1063 </sup> <n>the firstripe fruit</n> אִוְּתָ֥ה <sup>183 </sup> <n>desired</n> נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>my soul</n>
2: אָבַ֤ד <sup>6 </sup> <n>[man] is perished</n> חָסִיד֙ <sup>2623 </sup> <n>The good</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of the earth</n> וְיָשָׁ֥ר <sup>3477 </sup> <n>and [there is] none upright</n> בָּאָדָ֖ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>among men</n> אָ֑יִן <sup>369 </sup> <n>and there</n> כֻּלָּם֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> לְדָמִ֣ים <sup>1818 </sup> <n>for blood</n> יֶאֱרֹ֔בוּ <sup>693 </sup> <n>they all lie in wait</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אָחִ֖יהוּ <sup>251 </sup> <n>his brother</n> יָצ֥וּדוּ <sup>6679 </sup> <n>they hunt</n> חֵֽרֶם׃ <sup>2764 </sup> <n>with a net</n>
3: עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>Concerning</n> הָרַ֤ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>That they may do evil</n> כַּפַּ֙יִם֙ <sup>3709 </sup> <n>with both hands</n> לְהֵיטִ֔יב <sup>3190 </sup> <n>earnestly</n> הַשַּׂ֣ר <sup>8269 </sup> <n>the prince</n> שֹׁאֵ֔ל <sup>7592 </sup> <n>asketh</n> וְהַשֹּׁפֵ֖ט <sup>8199 </sup> <n>and the judge</n> בַּשִּׁלּ֑וּם <sup>7966 </sup> <n>[asketh] for a reward</n> וְהַגָּד֗וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>and the great</n> דֹּבֵ֨ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>[man] he uttereth</n> הַוַּ֥ת <sup>1942 </sup> <n>his mischievous</n> נַפְשׁ֛וֹ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>desire</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>they</n> וַֽיְעַבְּתֽוּהָ׃ <sup>5686 </sup> <n>so they wrap it up</n>
4: טוֹבָ֣ם <sup>2896 </sup> <n>The best</n> כְּחֵ֔דֶק <sup>2312 </sup> <n>of them [is] as a brier</n> יָשָׁ֖ר <sup>3477 </sup> <n>the most upright</n> מִמְּסוּכָ֑ה <sup>4534 </sup> <n>[is sharper] than a thorn hedge</n> י֤וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>the day</n> מְצַפֶּ֙יךָ֙ <sup>6822 </sup> <n>of thy watchmen</n> פְּקֻדָּתְךָ֣ <sup>6486 </sup> <n>[and] thy visitation</n> בָ֔אָה <sup>935 </sup> <n>cometh</n> עַתָּ֥ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Then</n> תִהְיֶ֖ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will occur</n> מְבוּכָתָֽם׃ <sup>3998 </sup> <n>now shall be their perplexity</n>
5: אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> תַּאֲמִ֣ינוּ <sup>539 </sup> <n>Trust</n> בְרֵ֔עַ <sup>7453 </sup> <n>ye not in a friend</n> אַֽל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּבְטְח֖וּ <sup>982 </sup> <n>put ye not confidence</n> בְּאַלּ֑וּף <sup>441 </sup> <n>in a guide</n> מִשֹּׁכֶ֣בֶת <sup>7901 </sup> <n>from her that lieth</n> חֵיקֶ֔ךָ <sup>2436 </sup> <n>in thy bosom</n> שְׁמֹ֖ר <sup>8104 </sup> <n>keep</n> פִּתְחֵי־ <sup>6607 </sup> <n>the doors</n> פִֽיךָ׃ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>of thy mouth</n>
6: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> בֵן֙ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>For the son</n> מְנַבֵּ֣ל <sup>5034 </sup> <n>dishonoureth</n> אָ֔ב <sup>1 </sup> <n>the father</n> בַּ֚ת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>the daughter</n> קָמָ֣ה <sup>6965 </sup> <n>riseth up</n> בְאִמָּ֔הּ <sup>517 </sup> <n>against her mother</n> כַּלָּ֖ה <sup>3618 </sup> <n>the daughter in law</n> בַּחֲמֹתָ֑הּ <sup>2545 </sup> <n>against her mother in law</n> אֹיְבֵ֥י <sup>341 </sup> <n>enemies</n> אִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>a man's</n> אַנְשֵׁ֥י <sup>582 </sup> <n>[are] the men</n> בֵיתֽוֹ׃ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of his own house</n>
7: וַאֲנִי֙ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> בַּיהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> אֲצַפֶּ֔ה <sup>6822 </sup> <n>Therefore I will look</n> אוֹחִ֖ילָה <sup>3176 </sup> <n>I will wait</n> לֵאלֹהֵ֣י <sup>430 </sup> <n>for the God</n> יִשְׁעִ֑י <sup>3468 </sup> <n>of my salvation</n> יִשְׁמָעֵ֖נִי <sup>8085 </sup> <n>will hear</n> אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>my God</n>
8: אַֽל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> תִּשְׂמְחִ֤י <sup>8056 </sup> <n>glad</n> אֹיַ֙בְתִּי֙ <sup>341 </sup> <n>not against me O mine enemy</n> לִ֔י כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Though</n> נָפַ֖לְתִּי <sup>5307 </sup> <n>when I fall</n> קָ֑מְתִּי <sup>6965 </sup> <n>I shall arise</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Though</n> אֵשֵׁ֣ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>when I sit</n> בַּחֹ֔שֶׁךְ <sup>2822 </sup> <n>in darkness</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> א֥וֹר <sup>216 </sup> <n>[shall be] a light</n> לִֽי׃ ס
9: זַ֤עַף <sup>2197 </sup> <n>the indignation</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֶשָּׂ֔א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>I will bear</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> חָטָ֖אתִי <sup>2398 </sup> <n>because I have sinned</n> ל֑וֹ עַד֩ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>he</n> יָרִ֤יב <sup>7378 </sup> <n>against him until he plead</n> רִיבִי֙ <sup>7379 </sup> <n>my cause</n> וְעָשָׂ֣ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and execute</n> מִשְׁפָּטִ֔י <sup>4941 </sup> <n>judgment</n> יוֹצִיאֵ֣נִי <sup>3318 </sup> <n>for me he will bring me forth</n> לָא֔וֹר <sup>216 </sup> <n>to the light</n> אֶרְאֶ֖ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>[and] I shall behold</n> בְּצִדְקָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>his righteousness</n>
10: וְתֵרֶ֤א <sup>7200 </sup> <n>shall see</n> אֹיַ֙בְתִּי֙ <sup>341 </sup> <n>Then [she that is] mine enemy</n> וּתְכַסֶּ֣הָ <sup>3680 </sup> <n>shall cover</n> בוּשָׁ֔ה <sup>955 </sup> <n>[it] and shame</n> הָאֹמְרָ֣ה <sup>559 </sup> <n>her which said</n> אֵלַ֔י <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אַיּ֖וֹ <sup>346 </sup> <n>where</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto me Where is the LORD</n> אֱלֹהָ֑יִךְ <sup>430 </sup> <n>angels</n> עֵינַי֙ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>affliction</n> תִּרְאֶ֣ינָּה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>shall behold</n> בָּ֔הּ עַתָּ֛ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>time</n> תִּֽהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לְמִרְמָ֖ס <sup>4823 </sup> <n>her now shall she be trodden down</n> כְּטִ֥יט <sup>2916 </sup> <n>as the mire</n> חוּצֽוֹת׃ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>of the streets</n>
11: י֖וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[In] the day</n> לִבְנ֣וֹת <sup>1129 </sup> <n>are to be built</n> גְּדֵרָ֑יִךְ <sup>1447 </sup> <n>that thy walls</n> י֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[in] that day</n> הַה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יִרְחַק־ <sup>7368 </sup> <n>be far removed</n> חֹֽק׃ <sup>2706 </sup> <n>shall the decree</n>
12: י֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[In] that day</n> הוּא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וְעָדֶ֣יךָ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>they</n> יָב֔וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>[also] he shall come</n> לְמִנִּ֥י <sup>4480 </sup> <n>From</n> אַשּׁ֖וּר <sup>804 </sup> <n>even to thee from Assyria</n> וְעָרֵ֣י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> מָצ֑וֹר <sup>4692 </sup> <n>besieged</n> וּלְמִנִּ֤י <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> מָצוֹר֙ <sup>4693 </sup> <n>and [from] the fortified</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>even</n> נָהָ֔ר <sup>5104 </sup> <n>even to the river</n> וְיָ֥ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>and from sea</n> מִיָּ֖ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>to sea</n> וְהַ֥ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>and [from] mountain</n> הָהָֽר׃ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>to mountain</n>
13: וְהָיְתָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will become</n> הָאָ֛רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>Notwithstanding the land</n> לִשְׁמָמָ֖ה <sup>8077 </sup> <n>shall be desolate</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>because</n> יֹֽשְׁבֶ֑יהָ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>because of them that dwell</n> מִפְּרִ֖י <sup>6529 </sup> <n>therein for the fruit</n> מַֽעַלְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>4611 </sup> <n>of their doings</n> ס
